ygData.subject: I am Back!
ygData.msgSnippet: I now know more than I ever wanted to know about SCSI chains, hi/lo byte, termination, and what all these (misused) SCSI/fast/ultra/SCSI-2/SCSI-3/LVD terms
ygData.messageBody:
I now know more than I ever wanted to know about SCSI chains,
hi/lo byte, termination, and what all these (misused)
SCSI/fast/ultra/SCSI-2/SCSI-3/LVD terms mean. Good news is
everything is fixed and so far it seems to be more stable than
before.

I also had a small problem with stormhaven.org's sshd
using an RSA key greater than 1024-bits, while none of the ssh
binaries I could find were compiled to handle that (seems they
changed the path on the primary ftp site, and all the mirrors
broke). That prevented me from getting to my email from work.

Oh, and there was this little thing called Thanksgiving too.
Hope everyone had a great holiday. Now to get all my software
reinstalled...

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
